Name: Among Ass 2: Butt Warfare
About the game: Asses are back in an adrenaline-pumping sequel! Now you can fight back bad asses with big boom sticks! Gather friends and choose a side of the conflict. The game is an arena shooter where each player takes a role regular ass. Each of them has its own goals, depending on the selected game mode. Defend important elements of the ship, repair, or clash in a battle for survival where the only goal is to stay alive. Freatures: *Large number of game settings and the ability to add bots *Customization. Customize the color and different hats and accessories *large number of different types of weapons *Local multiplayer up to 2 players *Ability to play through the 'Steam Remote Play' online! *3 different game modes *Gachi Mode is back in the sequel!
